DOC.brief_summary: Pre-portioned entrées commonly consume help control portion size limit energy intake . Few study , however , investigated influence characteristic pre-portioned entrées energy intake . This study investigate characteristic solid pre-portioned entrées , specifically , variation energy content energy density influence energy intake day . The investigator hypothesize reduce energy content energy density compulsory entrées act independently add together reduce daily energy intake .
DOC.brief_title: Energy Content Energy Density Pre-portioned Entrees
DOC.detailed_description: This experiment use crossover design repeat measure within subject . One day week four week , participant provide food beverage breakfast , lunch , dinner meal . Across test day , entrée meal vary energy content energy density standard level ( 100 % ) reduce level ( 64 % standard ) . Following consumption compulsory entrée , variety unmanipulated food serve ad libitum consumption . The order experimental condition counterbalance across subject .
